SEARCH
Package Engine

Class PathFinder

java.lang.Object
Engine.PathFinder
public class PathFinder extends Object
The PathFinder class is responsible for finding a path between two positions on a grid.
Author:
joey

  • Method Details

    • findPath

      public List<Vector2> findPath(Vector2 startPosition, Vector2 endPosition)
      Finds a path between the given start and end positions.
      Parameters:
      startPosition - The start position.
      endPosition - The end position.
      Returns:
      A list of positions representing the path, or null if no path is found.
